channel.title: Script Please
channel.description:
** pk inventory = green
I don't mean to sound picky... but I need someone to code for me a moparscape server. I want it to be same as ChillScape, although I want a few things different, though. 1.)I want this default armor (the armor you have when you just make a file) Robinhood Hat, Veracs Brassard, Dragon Platelegs, Desert Boots, Cooking Gauntlets, Legends Cape, Abbysal Whip, White Shield. 2.)I want the rune command (::rune)to give 20m of all runes. 3.)I want a command to give you full white armor set. (i want command to be ::white) I want a command to give Pking Inventory. (command desired -- ::pkin [color=green]I want the Pking Inventory to include the following: 2 Super Str Pots, 2 Mage Pots, 10 Sharks, Fury Ammy, Desert Boots, Cooking Gauntlets, Black DHide Chaps, Dragon ChainBody, Robinhood Hat, Ranging boots, Abbysal Whip, Holy book, and Cape Of Legends. 4.)Last, I want a command that gives 5k Rune Poison Arrows.
i want all that put into a script to put into a mopar scape server... (if possible)

item.title: Script Please
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

besides that, this is the wrong forums completely. Use the forums over at www.moparisthebest.com/smf for your private server questions. duh.

Read full topic

item.title: Script Please
item.dc:creator: @LaztPwnage LaztPwnage
item.description:
@LaztPwnage wrote:

[/quote][quote=“exps35, post:2, topic:115763”]‘I want I want I want I want’. Damn, you need to go read a dictionary or something.[/quote]… i was trying to be specific… it’s better than saying "If possible, I would like you to possibly get me a possible command to possibly give [etc…]

Read full topic
